articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler wins the Masters for a second time after keeping his nerve at Augusta National as his rivals faltered.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Scottie Scheffler earns second Green Jacket at Augusta National

articles.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder settle a historic contest for the top seed in the Western Conference on the final day of the NBA's regular season.
articles.title: NBA final day: Oklahoma City Thunder clinch Western Conference top seed for play-offs

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen end Bayern Munich's era of dominance and clinch their first Bundesliga title with five games to spare by beating Werder Bremen.
articles.title: Leverkusen win Bundesliga with five games to spare

articles.description: Aston Villa produce an outstanding performance to stun Arsenal and leave Manchester City in pole position in the Premier League title race.
articles.title: Late Villa goals dent Arsenal's title challenge

articles.description: Liverpool's Premier League title hopes suffer a huge blow as they fall to a 1-0 defeat by Crystal Palace at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool's title hopes hit by loss to Palace

articles.description: The Serie A match between Udinese and Roma is abandoned after Evan Ndicka collapses on the pitch.
articles.title: Udinese v Roma abandoned after Ndicka collapses

articles.description: Stefanos Tsitsipas beat Casper Ruud to win the Monte Carlo Masters for the third time.
articles.title: Monte Carlo Masters: Stefanos Tsitsipas beats Casper Ruud to win third title

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at some of the statistics behind Bayer Leverkusen's first Bundesliga League title, which they achieved with five games to spare.
articles.title: The stats behind Leverkusen's unbeaten title run

articles.description: Max Holloway's final-second stoppage of Justin Gaethje at UFC 300 is described as the "KO of the century" by commentator Joe Rogan.
articles.title: UFC 300: Max Holloway beats Justin Gaethje with 'KO of the century'

articles.description: Scotland's Blair Kinghorn scores 23 points as five-time Investec Champions Cup winners Toulouse sweep aside Exeter to reach the semi-finals.
articles.title: Toulouse thrash Exeter to seal semi with Harlequins
